00094 class stPage{
00095 
00096    public:
00097 
00104       stPage (stSize size, stPageID pageid = 0);
00105 
00109       virtual ~stPage();
00110 
00121       virtual void Write(stByte * buff, stSize n, stSize offset);
00122 
00128       virtual stSize GetPageSize();
00129 
00140       virtual stByte * GetData();
00141 
00148       stPageID GetPageID(){
00149 
00150          return PageID;
00151       }//end GetPageID
00152 
00158       void SetPageID(stPageID pageID){
00159 
00160          PageID = pageID;
00161       }//end SetPageID
00162 
00171       void Copy(stPage * page);
00172 
00176       void Clear();
00177 
00178    protected:
00179 
00183       stByte * Buffer;
00184 
00188       stSize BufferSize;
00189 
00190    private:
00191

00196       
00197 };//end stPage

00199 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00200 // Class stLockablePage
00201 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00216 class stLockablePage: public stPage{
00217 
00218    public:
00219 
00229       stLockablePage (stSize size, stSize locksize,
00230             stPageID pageid = 0):stPage(size, pageid){
00231 
00232          this->Lock(locksize);
00233       }//end stLockablePage
00234 
00245       virtual void Write(stByte * buff, stSize n, stSize offset);
00246 
00254       virtual stSize GetPageSize();
00255 
00268       virtual stByte * GetData();
00269 
00275       bool IsLocked(){
00276 
00277          return (this->LockSize != 0);
00278       }//end IsLocked
00279 
00283       stSize GetLockSize(){
00284 
00285          return this->LockSize;
00286       }//end GetLockSize
00287 
00298       void Lock(stSize size){
00299 
00300          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00301          if (size >= this->BufferSize){
00302             throw invalid_argument("Unable to lock the entire page.");
00303          }//end if
00304          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00305 
00306          this->LockSize = size;
00307       }//end Lock
00308 
00315       const stByte * GetTrueData(){
00316 
00317          return this->Buffer;
00318       }//end GetTrueData
00319 
00324       stSize GetTruePageSize(){
00325 
00326          return this->BufferSize;
00327       }//end GetTRuePageSize
00328 
00329    private:
00330 
00334       stSize LockSize;
00335       
00336 };//end stLockablePage

00340 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00351 class stPageAllocator{
00352 
00353    public:
00354 
00361       stPageAllocator(stSize pageSize){
00362          this->pageSize = pageSize;
00363       }//end pageSize
00364       
00368       stPage * Create(){
00369          return new stPage(pageSize, 0);
00370       }//end Create
00371       
00377       void Dispose(stPage * instance){
00378          delete instance;
00379       }//end Dispose
00380 
00381    private:
00382 
00386       stSize pageSize;
00387         
00388 };//end stPageAllocator
